text: geom Geom annotate, "text". aes Named list aesthetics corresponding data values, `list(x = 3, y = 30, label = "label")`. params Optional. Named list parameters geom, `list(colour = "black")` facets Optional. Named list facets; name variable value level, `list(cyl = 4)`.

title: Create a ggplot2 annotation given some aesthetics, parameters, and facet variables + values. — make_layer
code: library(ggplot2)  base_plot <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +   geom_point() +   facet_wrap(~cyl)  my_annot_call <- make_layer("text",   aes = list(x = 3, y = 30, label = "A label"),   facets = list(cyl = 6),   params = list(col = "red") )  my_annotation <- eval(my_annot_call)  base_plot + my_annotation

title: ggannotate 0.3.0
text: Annotations across different facet panels geom parameters now combined single geom call, producing concise code. Annotations longer lost switching layers Shiny gadget (#11). ggannotate() now includes “Delete” button remove current annotation layer (#11). ggannotate() now intelligently rounds x y coordinate values generated annotation code based axis range, producing cleaner output (#44). ggannotate() longer briefly errors switching new layer rect geom completing brush selection. annotation layer dropdown now shows geom type layer, e.g. “1 ” (#11).
